summary: Nickelodeon, often called Nick, is a popular TV channel for kids and teens. It started in 1979 as the first cable channel made just for children. The channel offers fun shows for various age groups, from preschoolers to teenagers. Over time, it added more channels like Nick Jr. for younger kids and Nicktoons for animated shows. Nickelodeon has changed a lot since its early days, but it's still a big part of many kids' TV time.
title: Nickelodeon
